personal_data.name: Rodolfo Silva
personal_data.profession: Software Engineer, Full-stack Developer & Systems Analyst
personal_data.description: I create and develop elegantly simple solutions, driven by my passion for crafting beautiful and functional designs.
personal_data.about_title: Hi, I'm Rodolfo Silva. Thank you for visiting my site.
personal_data.about_description: Experienced Web Developer adept in all stages of web development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and maintenance of web systems. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill set. Proficient in a variety of technologies including Java, SpringBoot, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, MongoDB, and MySQL. Capable of effectively self-managing during independent projects, as well as collaborating in a team.

footer.about_description: Diego Seven Sistemas specializes in software, web, and mobile development, delivering innovative solutions for your business needs.

responsibilities: Design and develop applications using Agile Scrum methodology, using Atlassian tools like Jira and Confluence, dividing the project into multiple sprints.
Use Bitbucket for version control collaborating with other developers using pull requests.
Bamboo and Nexus are used for continuous integration of builds.
Design and develop web applications using HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, Angular and NodeJS.
Responsible for the style, appearance and behavior of the web page with SASS that extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations, and functions.
Use custom Angular directives and develop reusable components and templates that could be reused in various locations of the application.
Develop reusable Typescript components and services to consume REST APIs using component-based architecture provided by Angular.
Develop new endpoints in SpringBoot that provided JSON data to the Angular web application.
Implement HTTP requests using the Observable RxJS library to handle multiple types of values.
Experienced working with advanced JavaScript like ECMAScript 6 (ES6).
Develop unit tests for all classes created using Jest Framework, JUnit and Mockito in TDD environment.
Develop APIs to interact with the database using Spring Boot. Worked extensively with Spring JDBC, Spring Hibernate ORM and JPA.
Use Swagger to document all service APIs, documenting request body, header and response details.
experiences.environment: Angular, JavaScript, Typescript, npm, NodeJs, Spring Boot, JUnit, Mockito, Java, MySQL, MongoDB, Linux, Docker, Bamboo, Nexus, Bitbucket and Git Bash

Use custom Angular and React directives and develop reusable components and templates that could be reused in various locations of the application.
Develop reusable Typescript components and services to consume REST APIs using component-based architecture provided by Angular and React.
Develop new endpoints in SpringBoot that provided JSON data to the Angular and React web applications.
Implement HTTP requests using the Observable RxJS library to handle multiple types of values.
Experienced working with advanced JavaScript like ECMAScript 6 (ES6).
Develop unit tests for all classes created using Jest Framework, JUnit and Mockito in TDD environment.
Develop APIs to interact with the database using Spring Boot. Worked extensively with Spring JDBC, Spring Hibernate ORM and JPA.
Develop job projects in Spring Batch that consumed external APIs interacting and receiving data from RabbitMQ.
Use Swagger to document all service APIs, documenting request body, header and response details.
